name: Ext_R5_DocumentReference_context
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DocumentReference.context for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.context from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Describes the clinical encounter or type of care that the document content is associated with.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.context` maps to R4B `DocumentReference.context`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `DocumentReference.context` has no related element in R4B:Media
